title: ‘It looked like the devil was in there.’ Killer brutally strangles girlfriend for staying out all night: Police
itunes:title: ‘It looked like the devil was in there.’ Killer brutally strangles girlfriend for staying out all night: Police
description:
A young man walks into a New York City police station to report that he had murdered his beautiful 21-year-old girlfriend — because he was angry she had stayed out all night.


Nancy's expert panel weighs in on the case:

Joseph Scott Morgan: Forensics expert, and author of “Blood Beneath My Feet”

Caryn Stark: Psychologist

Ashley Wilcott: Juvenile Court Judge & Trial Attorney

Ellen Killoran: Crimeonline.com Investigative Reporter


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
